description: This Italian Sausage Bow Tie Pasta is a weeknight wonder that combines tender pasta with savory sausage in a creamy sauce. It's quick, easy, and utterly irresistible, making it the perfect dish for busy evenings.
instructions: Cook bow tie pasta according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add the Italian sausage, breaking it apart with a spoon.
Cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
Add minced garlic and cook for an additional minute until fragrant.
Stir in heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Add grated Parmesan cheese and stir until melted and combined.
Toss the cooked pasta with the sauce, seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil.
tips: For a richer flavor, consider adding a splash of white wine to the sauce before adding the cream.

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Cook the sausage until it's nicely browned for the best flavor.
  • Avoid overcooking the pasta; it should be al dente.
  • The sauce should be creamy and coat the pasta well; if too thick, add a splash of pasta water.
  • This dish can be stored in the fridge for up to 3 days and reheated gently.
